about_the_game:
Demo Features:

Embark on an Epic Adventure as Reynard in 'Tails of Fate Demo'

Get a taste of the action with this demo preview, featuring a thrilling slice of the world you’ll explore in the full release!

  • Discover Over a dozen powerful items that will completely transform your build and approach to combat.

  • Battle Fierce enemies, elite foes, and a formidable boss that will test your skills to the limit.

  • Complete Exciting quests that push your adventure forward and reward your every effort.

  • Explore Metroidvania-style environments, unlocking upgrades that let you backtrack and uncover hidden secrets.

  • Navigate A small portion of the vast world map, allowing for quick travel and exciting backtracking.

Join fellow adventurers at the Tavern of Ursidae to trade gossip, look for new quests, or just celebrate your victories. Utilize it as the hub for your adventures in this beautiful, expansive world, which is full of mysterious ruins, dark dungeons, majestic castles, and eerie ancient woodlands.

Game Features:

  • Play as three different characters and seamlessly switch between different play styles and movesets. Charge into combat, swing your mighty sword, or lurk in the shadows and headhunt your victims with a crossbow.

  • Discover hidden areas and secrets as you explore a stunning, interconnected, beautifully hand-drawn pixel art world with over ten different biomes and zero loadtimes.

  • Master tight 2D controls: jump, roll, dash, and attack through a fun, fast-paced combat system utilizing an array of weapons and spells that can be customized to your preference.

  • Collect and Customize with over a hundred distinct items to completely change your playstyle to your exact liking.

  • Challenge a plethora of unique enemies and epicSouls-like bosses with their dynamic abilities and skills, and log them in your compendium in your quest to encounter them all.

  • Craft new potions and equipment with the help of the alchemist and forge to aid you in your adventures.

  • Listen to harmonic music and immerse yourself in a lush soundtrack composed by our talented team with a central theme by Monster Hunter composer Yuko Komiyama.

short_description: Fulfill this tale, as darkness swarms the fantasy lands of Fauna. Venture epic kingdoms and treacherous dungeons in a 2D action platformer, with Metroidvania elements in a hand-crafted pixel art world filled with souls-like boss fights, dungeon platforming, and dynamic enemy combat design.
